description: Polymer web component defining the IronSelectableBehavior for selectable items, including properties, event handling, and selection logic.

classes.name: Polymer.IronSelectableBehavior
classes.description: A Polymer behavior providing selection capabilities for list items, including properties, event handling, and selection methods.

methods.name: indexOf
methods.description: Returns the index of a given item in the items list.

methods.name: select
methods.description: Sets the selected value.

methods.name: selectPrevious
methods.description: Selects the previous item in the list.

methods.name: selectNext
methods.description: Selects the next item in the list.

methods.name: _addListener
methods.description: Adds an event listener for the activation event.

methods.name: _removeListener
methods.description: Removes the event listener for the activation event.

methods.name: _activateEventChanged
methods.description: Handles changes to the activateEvent property, updating event listeners accordingly.

methods.name: _updateItems
methods.description: Updates the list of items based on the DOM.

methods.name: _updateSelected
methods.description: Updates the selection state based on the current selected value.

methods.name: _selectSelected
methods.description: Selects the item corresponding to the current selected value.

methods.name: _filterItem
methods.description: Filters out excluded local names from the item list.

methods.name: _valueToItem
methods.description: Converts a value to the corresponding item.

methods.name: _valueToIndex
methods.description: Converts a value to an index in the items array.

methods.name: _indexToValue
methods.description: Converts an index to its corresponding value.

methods.name: _valueForItem
methods.description: Retrieves the value for a given item based on attrForSelected.

methods.name: _applySelection
methods.description: Applies visual and attribute changes when an item is selected or deselected.

methods.name: _selectionChange
methods.description: Updates the selectedItem property when selection changes.

methods.name: _observeItems
methods.description: Sets up mutation observers to detect changes in the item list.

methods.name: _activateHandler
methods.description: Handles activation events from items.

methods.name: _itemActivate
methods.description: Activates an item programmatically.
